content.p: As part of our celebration of Inter Faith Week 2024, join us for an engaging and thought-provoking workshop led by Professor Kristin Aune, where we'll explore strategies to address and combat religion-based hate crimes on our diverse campus. This interactive event offers a valuable opportunity to learn how we can foster a more inclusive, respectful, and safe environment for people of all faiths. Don't miss out! Be part of the solution and help create a campus where everyone feels welcome. Join us for an engaging and thought-provoking workshop led by Professor Kristin Aune, where we'll explore strategies to address and combat religion-based hate crimes on our diverse campus.
